function.name: write_file
function.description: Write content to a file in the workspace. Creates parent directories if needed. Use this to create or modify files in your project.

path.description: Relative path to the file (e.g., 'src/index.ts' or 'package.json')

content.description: Content to write to the file

function.name: read_file
function.description: Read the contents of a file from the workspace. Use this to inspect existing files or verify what you've written.

path.description: Relative path to the file to read (e.g., 'package.json' or 'src/App.tsx')

function.name: run_command
function.description: Execute a shell command in the workspace. Use this to run build commands, tests, install dependencies, start servers, etc. The command runs with a 5-minute timeout by default.

command.description: Shell command to execute (e.g., 'pnpm install' or 'npm run build')

cwd.description: Optional working directory relative to workspace (defaults to workspace root)

function.name: finish_task
function.description: Declare that the task is complete. ONLY call this after you have verified the application works by running builds, tests, and/or starting the server successfully. Include a summary of what was accomplished.

summary.description: Brief summary of what was accomplished and how you verified it works
